headline: MGM (MGM) Down 25.3% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Rebound?
summary: MGM (MGM) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: WYNN, MGM, or CHDN: Which Casino Stock Holds the Winning Hand?
summary: The gaming and hospitality world has been buzzing with opportunity following these past few weeks’ brutal sell-off, and few names are as electrifying as the three prominent casino stocks: Wynn Resorts (WYNN), MGM Resorts International (MGM), and Churchill Downs (CHDN). Each company stands at the crossroads of risk and reward. Wynn is pushing luxury boundaries on a global scale, MGM is banking on the digital gold rush and Macau’s grand revival, while Churchill Downs is merging classic Americana w

headline: MGM Resorts taps NBCUniversal exec for board
summary: Donna Langley will bring experience in content strategy, distribution and marketing to the board as its 13th member, per MGM Chair Paul Salem.
